casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Steven L. PEOPLES. No. 3P10-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Steven L. Peoples, Bunn, for Peoples, Steven L. Amy Kunstling Irene, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion *849The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of July 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
